column4: anyone know when gcc 3.4 breezy package is going to be fixed on amd64?
it can't install g++-3.4 due to file conflicts
there'a major C++ transition right now in breezy
though i'm not sure that is what is causing this, it appears someone moved files between parts of the gcc-3.4 source package and forgot to remove them from other parts
its a conflict between g++-3.4 and libstdc++-6-0-dev both of which are part of the same source
what's with the various file sizes for the same image?
they look right according to filesize from what i see elsewhere
I see others besides the two you listed, and they have different sizes.
